<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Marvelous Calliope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=587)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Structure" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=153" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 74</row>

**Price** 100 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L when not activated
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This large slide whistle appears to be made of fine brass, the sides of which are engraved with musical notes and dancing clowns.

<document level="2" id="action-369" />

name: Marvelous Calliope
